title: Data Analysis for “Interfacial Strain Effects on Lithium Diffusion Pathways in the Spinel Solid Electrolyte Li-Doped MgAl2O4”

creators.name: O'Rourke, Conn
creators.affiliation: Department of Chemistry, University of Bath, Claverton Down, Bath, BA2 7AY, UK.

creators.name: Morgan, Benjamin J.
creators.affiliation: Department of Chemistry, University of Bath, Claverton Down, Bath, BA2 7AY, UK.

description: This repository contains data analysis that supports the findings reported in C. O’Rourke and B. J. Morgan, “Interfacial Strain Effects on Lithium Diffusion Pathways in the Spinel Solid Electrolyte Li-Doped MgAl2O4”, and code for plotting figures in this paper.
